column4: hi everyone! i have a problem: today i mounted an Ati radeon 9550. The drivers installation went allright, but the screen flicks too much. Sometimes i even can't see what's on the monitor. I've setted properly the refresh (1280+1024 @60hz) like the monitor's manual tell to do. So what's the problem?
please help me, i'm getting an headache with all this flicks!
try not specifying refresh rates and letting X guess 'em
i've tried the simplified monitor rilevation, but it doesn't work so good...
maybe you're blinking too much
the monitor is blinking, not me!
is your xorg using DDC?
i don't know ddc
what's DDC?
um... it autodetects monitor settings
it's an X module...
just say 'Load "ddc"' in your Modules section
and comment out your HorizSync, etc.
and maybe it'll do it all automagically
can we talk in pvt?
no... i forgot my nickserv password
foget: i canno ttalk in pvt, i'm not registered
i've already uncommented the hsync and vsync
no, COMMENT them out... and Load "ddc" module, then maybe X will recognize your monitor automatically
reconfigure-xorg auto-recognize the brand of the monitor. Then where i have to write the DDC module? in the xorg.conf?
err.. yeah. someone else can probably help you out with editing your xorg.conf, i have to go... sorry
don't worry, thanks!
